--- Brian Button <bbutton01@...> wrote:
> MIDP stuff, but my pair partner is pretty experienced. He seems to
> believe that we'll have a problem following a model like this for the
> connection and socket stuff, since the API is different. Have you
> encountered this?

You might try a mock implementation of the GCF pieces that you need. We
*are* an implementation of the GCF when we run on MIDP, so it's not an
issue for us. UI (either LCD or high level) will have the same problem
as those classes don't exist in J2SE.

Regards,

Rob
